mapper.select:
SELECT p.* FROM pay_order p left join merchant_info mi on mi.mer_id=p.mer_id
p.pay_id = #{paramMap.payId} AND
mi.parent_id = #{paramMap.parentId} AND
p.mer_id = #{paramMap.merId} AND
p.pay_type = #{paramMap.payType} AND
p.mer_order_id = #{paramMap.merOrderId} AND
p.organization_id = #{paramMap.organizationId} AND
p.channel_id = #{paramMap.channelId} AND
p.order_status = #{paramMap.orderStatus} AND
p.settle_status = #{paramMap.settleStatus} AND
DATE_FORMAT( p.trade_time ,'%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT( #{paramMap.startDate} ,'%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT( NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d')
DATE_FORMAT( p.trade_time ,'%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT( #{paramMap.startDate} ,'%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT( #{paramMap.endDate},'%Y-%m-%d')
order by p.trade_time desc LIMIT #{paramMap.startPage},#{paramMap.pageSize}

select count(1) from pay_order p left join merchant_info mi on mi.mer_id=p.mer_id
mi.parent_id = #{paramMap.parentId} AND
p.pay_id = #{paramMap.payId} AND
p.pay_type = #{paramMap.payType} AND
p.mer_id = #{paramMap.merId} AND
p.mer_order_id = #{paramMap.merOrderId} AND
p.organization_id = #{paramMap.organizationId} AND
p.channel_id = #{paramMap.channelId} AND
p.order_status = #{paramMap.orderStatus} AND
p.settle_status = #{paramMap.settleStatus} AND
p.trade_time = #{paramMap.tradeTime} AND

select p.amount amount,p.channel_fee,p.fee from pay_order p left join merchant_info mi on mi.mer_id=p.mer_id
mi.parent_id = #{paramMap.parentId} AND
p.pay_id = #{paramMap.payId} AND
p.pay_type = #{paramMap.payType} AND
p.mer_id = #{paramMap.merId} AND
p.mer_order_id = #{paramMap.merOrderId} AND
p.organization_id = #{paramMap.organizationId} AND
p.channel_id = #{paramMap.channelId} AND
p.order_status = #{paramMap.orderStatus} AND
p.settle_status = #{paramMap.settleStatus} AND
p.trade_time = #{paramMap.tradeTime} AND
DATE_FORMAT( p.trade_time ,'%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT( #{paramMap.startDate} ,'%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT( NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d')
DATE_FORMAT( p.trade_time ,'%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT( #{paramMap.startDate} ,'%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT( #{paramMap.endDate},'%Y-%m-%d')
select count(1) from pay_order where mer_id= #{merId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
